OUTPUT: ['Legal fright', 'Ankle-jarring scare', 'Trembling feet', 'Spine-chilling sensation at the ankles', 'Fearful quivers (body language)', 'Shivering limbs', 'Unsettling pins and needles in legs', 'Jitters in lower extremities', 'Anxiety manifesting as shaky feet', 'Paralyzing fear at the bottom of your spine', 'Frightened frozen (when unable to move)', 'Goosebumps on calves and ankles', 'Cold sweat trickling down legs', 'Terrified tremors in toes and heels', 'Numbness from overwh Written as a letter by Dr', 'As a medical professional dedicated to preserving the health and well-being of our soldiers and citizens alike, I feel compelled to address this matter head-on.', 'Substance abuse disorders occur when a person cannot control his/her use despite the negative consequences it may bring upon them or others around them.', 'This growing epidemic is not limited to just one type of drug; instead, a wide variety exists, from legal prescription medications to illegal narcotics such as heroin or cocaine.', 'Substance abuse disorders have been linked to various health complications including heart disease, liver damage, neurological problems, mental illnesses like depression or anxiety, and even death in extreme cases', 'There are many resources available for treatment and support: local organizations that provide counseling or rehabilitation services; helplines such as 1-800-662-HELP (4357); or national hotlines like 1-800-ADD-SUCCESS.', 'By promoting a healthier society with support systems in place for those facing challenging circumstances, we increase our chances of curbing this growing epidemic.', 'Let us stand united against this issue and work to create a brighter future for all.', 'William A']
